Reviews.Title: replace 2 in 4 years
Reviews.Author: shawn grimm
Reviews.Content: I have had to replace this keypad twice since 2009.  It's not damaged from over use because it's not on a main door but it seems the keypad just isn't weather proof enough. The CPU seems fine, but it's indoors above the ceiling tiles.  I'll have to make a box to protect it from the weather I guess?.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I have used this stable, reliable and durable unit since 2004 and have only good things to review as well as my customers. If more were available I would definitely want to wish list them all. Thanks and enjoy.
